sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import './categoriesTab.scss' import MyTitle from '../../../MyTitle/MyTitle' import CategoriesConfig from '../CategoriesConfig/CategoriesConfig' import Task from '../Task/Task' const CategoriesTab = ({ darkMode, category, idx, tab, setTab, listItems, setListItem }) => { const [modal, setModal] = useState(false) const removeCategory = category => { setTab(listItems[idx - 1] || listItems[1]) return setListItem(listItems.filter(e => e !== category)) } return (
{category.title}
Active tasks
{category.data .filter(item => item.completed === true) .map(item => ( {item.task} ))}
Completed tasks
) } export default CategoriesTab
